channel.title: Shop in [Rune]-[M]tp
channel.description: where is the location of the shop in the RRRRRune-mtp download the one with korasi and stuff would really help out i cant find it !

item.title: Shop in [Rune]-[M]tp
item.dc:creator: @RS2BullDog RS2BullDog
item.description:
@RS2BullDog wrote:

all shops are in ‘shops.cfg’. Have a look in there and find the item ID that you want to search for. All item ids will be in ‘Item.cfg’.

Note: This is for 377’s that are PI’s or Delta or Allstar sources… 508’s im not sure where the shop ids are lol.

If you wana know the location of a shop ON SERVER then find the NPC id of that shop and find where he is spawned then tele there and there is that shop

Read full topic
